verbose_text: The efflux proteins MRP2 and P-glycoprotein (P-gp) located at the apical membrane of enterocytes are also upregulated by cadmium [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and may thus influence the bioavailability of the metal.
evidence: MRP2 and P-glycoprotein (P-gp) located at the apical membrane of enterocytes are also upregulated by cadmium
